description.0: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

0.0: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates <cryo>4</cryo> Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate <cryo>4%</cryo> HP every 2s for this duration.

1.0: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates <cryo>4.5</cryo> Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate <cryo>4.5%</cryo> HP every 2s for this duration.

2.0: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates <cryo>5</cryo> Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate <cryo>5%</cryo> HP every 2s for this duration.

3.0: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates <cryo>5.5</cryo> Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate <cryo>5.5%</cryo> HP every 2s for this duration.

4.0: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates <cryo>6</cryo> Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate <cryo>6%</cryo> HP every 2s for this duration.
